DataElement.preferredName: Enrollment Chart Abstraction Flag PCORnet CMD Indicator Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.:The process of reading the record of a health encounter to determine and document the condition the patient had, the cause, and the treatment prescribed. This information is typically assigned standard clinical terminology codes._An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.:The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled._The process of reading the record of a health encounter to determine and document the condition the patient had, the cause, and the treatment prescribed. This information is typically assigned standard clinical terminology codes._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A data model designed to standardize PCORnet data.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

The process of reading the record of a health encounter to determine and document the condition the patient had, the cause, and the treatment prescribed. This information is typically assigned standard clinical terminology codes.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
